test.query_clob:
select a50.pass_yn,
       a50.application_id,
			 null child_code,
       a50.page_id, 
       a50.page_name, 
       a50.component_id, 
			 null parent_component_id,
       a50.item_name, 
       a50.region,
       a50.created_by, 
       a50.created_on, 
       a50.last_updated_by, 
       a50.last_updated_on,
			 a50.workspace,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1, is incorrectly named (id: %0, region: %2)^',
            p0 => a50.component_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.region
            )
            end as validation_failure_message,
       case when a50.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format(p_message => 
            q'^%1 is incorrectly named (page %0 app %2)^',
            p0 => a50.page_id, 
            p1 => a50.item_name, 
            p2 => a50.application_id
            )
            end as issue_title
from (
     select 
     case when pi.item_name like 'P'||pi.page_id||'_%'
          then 'Y'
          else 'N'
          end as pass_yn,
     pi.application_id,
     pi.item_id component_id, 
     pi.item_name, 
     pi.page_id, 
     pi.page_name, 
     pi.region,
     app.created_by created_by, 
     app.created_on created_on, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_by, app.last_updated_by) last_updated_by, 
     coalesce(pi.last_updated_on, app.last_updated_on) last_updated_on,
	   pi.workspace
     from apex_application_page_items pi
     inner join apex_application_pages app on  app.page_id = pi.page_id
                                           and app.application_id = pi.application_id
     inner join v_apex_applications aa on pi.application_id = aa.application_id
                                     and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
     where pi.page_id not like '%.%' --indicates a translated app 
) a50
test.explanation: Page Items should be prefixed "P" and the \`page id\`, e.g. "P1\_ITEM".

test.query_clob:
with std as (select case when pig.data_type in ('DATE', 'VARCHAR2')
                        then case when pig.heading_alignment = 'RIGHT'
                                  then 'LEFT_ALIGN_IG'
                                  end
                        when pig.data_type in ('NUMBER')
                        then case when pig.heading_alignment = 'LEFT'
                                  then 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IG'
                                  end
                        end child_code,
            pig.application_id, 
            pig.page_id, 
            pig.source_expression column_alias, 
            pig.heading, 
            pig.heading_alignment,
            null column_alignment,
            pig.item_type display_as,
            pig.data_type column_type,
            pig.region_id,
            pig.region_name,
            pig.column_id component_id,
            pig.last_updated_by,
            pig.last_updated_on,
            null created_on,
            null created_by,
						pig.workspace
        from  apex_appl_page_ig_columns pig
				where pig.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
        )
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn, 
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) %4', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id,
                            p4 => case when std.child_code  = 'LEFT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the left'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'RIGHT_ALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'should be aligned to the right'
                                       when std.child_code  = 'MISALIGN_IG'
                                       then 'is misaligned with the heading'
                                       end
                            ) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Column `%0` in `%1` (page %2, app %3) is incorrectly aligned', 
                            p0 => std.heading, 
                            p1 => std.region_name, 
                            p2 => std.page_id, 
                            p3 => std.application_id) issue_title,
       std.child_code,
       std.region_id,
       std.component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 std.workspace
from std
inner join apex_application_page_regions apr on std.application_id = apr.application_id 
                                             and std.page_id = apr.page_id
                                             and std.region_id = apr.region_id
                                             and coalesce(apr.report_template,'NA') != 'List Item'
where std.heading is not null
test.explanation:
Interactive Grid Columns should be aligned according to their data type :

*   LEFT\_ALIGN\_IG : Dates, names, identifier columns should be left aligned
*   MISALIGN\_IG : The Column and Column Heading have different alignment
*   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : Number columns should be right aligned
test.fix:
*   The Column and Heading should be aligned the same way:
    *   Left Align: All columns by default (dates, names, identifiers, etc)
    *   Center Align: Buttons / Actions / Icons / Badges
    *   Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)
    *   RIGHT\_ALIGN\_IG : \* Right Align: Number columns that represent size (e.g. budget / counts / etc)

test.test_name: Apps should have a centralized css file
test.query_clob:
with aac as (select workspace, application_id, count(1) page_count
                from apex_application_pages
                where workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
						    and inline_css is not null
                group by workspace, application_id),
    acss as (select application_id, count(1) file_count
                from apex_application_static_files
                where file_name like '%css'
                group by application_id),
     std as (
        select aac.application_id,
               null page_id,
               aa.created_by,
               aa.created_on,
               aa.last_updated_by,
               aa.last_updated_on,
               aa.css_file_urls,
               aac.page_count,
               acss.file_count,
			         aac.workspace,
               case when aac.page_count = 0
                    then 'Y' 
                    else case when coalesce(acss.file_count,0) = 0
                              then 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                              else case when aa.css_file_urls is null 
                                        then 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                                        end
                              end 
                    end child_code
        from aac 
        inner join apex_applications aa on aac.application_id = aa.application_id
        left outer join acss on acss.application_id = aac.application_id
     )
select case when std.child_code is not null
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a CSS file in Static Application Files (suggestion: `css/main.css`)'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file in Application Definition > User Interfaces > CSS File URLs'
                               end
                ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null
            then apex_string.format('App %0 %1',
                    p0 => std.application_id,
                    p1 => case when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_FILE'
                               then 'is missing a centralized CSS file'
                               when std.child_code = 'MISSING_CSS_REFERENCE'
                               then 'does not reference a centralized css file'
                               end
                ) 
            end  issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.css_file_urls,
     std.page_count,
     std.file_count,
		 std.application_id component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation: Apps with page-level inline css should have a css file in static files

test.test_name: Reflow / Toggle Column header is appropriate
test.query_clob:
with std as (select case when regexp_instr (translate(prc.heading,'()-',' '), '[[:punct:]]') > 0
                then 'NOPUNCTUATION_RF'
								when upper(prc.heading) like '%YN'
                then 'YESNO_RF'
                when prc.heading <> replace(prc.heading,'Id', 'ID')
                then 'CAPID_RF'
                end child_code,
       prc.application_id, 
       prc.page_id, 
       prc.name column_alias, 
       prc.heading report_label, 
       prc.region_name,
       prc.region_id,
       prc.region_column_id component_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       prc.last_updated_by,
       prc.last_updated_on,
       prc.is_visible,
			 prc.workspace
    from apex_application_page_reg_cols prc
    where prc.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
		and prc.is_visible = 'Yes'
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (region `%1`, page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code = 'NOPUNCTUATION_RF'
                                     then 'should not include punctuation'
																		 when std.child_code ='YESNO_RF'
																		 then 'should not include `YN`'
																		 when std.child_code ='CAPID_RF'
																		 then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                     end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` is incorrectly formatted (region `%1`, page %2, app %3, col id %4) ',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
													p4 => std.component_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation:
Reflow and Column Toggle headers should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free :

*   CAPID\_RF : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in Column Headers like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_RF : Column Headers should not include punctuation
*   YESNO\_RF : Never include YN as part of the column header's title
test.fix:
*   CAPID\_RF : Correct the capitalization
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_RF : Remove the punctuation
*   YESNO\_RF : Rename column heading

            then 'Y' 
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       std.created_by,
       std.created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` (IR `%1`, page %2, app %3) %4',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => case when std.child_code = 'NOPUNCTUATION_IR'
                                     then 'should not include punctuation'
																		 when std.child_code ='YESNO_IR'
																		 then 'should not include `YN`'
																		 when std.child_code ='CAPID_IR'
																		 then 'has incorrect capitalization for `ID`'
                                     end
                          ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('Column `%0` is incorrectly formatted (IR `%1`, page %2, app %3, col id %4) ',
                          p0 => std.report_label,
                          p1 => std.region_name,
                          p2 => std.page_id,
                          p3 => std.application_id,
													p4 => std.component_id
                          ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.component_id,
     null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
test.explanation:
Interactive Report Column headers should be meaningful, formatted and punctuation free :

*   CAPID\_IR : Ensure the letters I and D are both capitalized in Column Headers like "Service ID, Resource ID, Region ID, etc..." These are incorrect: Service Id, service id, etc...
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_IR : Column Headers should not include punctuation
*   YESNO\_IR : Never include YN as part of the column header's title
test.fix:
*   CAPID\_IR : Correct the capitalization
*   NOPUNCTUATION\_IR : Remove the punctuation
*   YESNO\_IR : Rename column heading

test.test_name: Pages should limit the amount of Dynamic Actions
test.query_clob:
with tmd as (select workspace, application_id, page_id, count(*) da_count
             from apex_application_page_da
						 where workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
             having count(*) > 20
             group by workspace, application_id, page_id)
select 'N'  pass_yn,
       tmd.application_id,
       tmd.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has %2 dynamic actions. It is not recommended to have more than 10.',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id,
                          tmd.da_count) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page %0 (app %1) has too many Dynamic Actions',
                          tmd.application_id,
                          tmd.page_id) issue_title,
       tmd.da_count,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 tmd.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 tmd.workspace
from tmd
inner join apex_application_pages aap on  tmd.application_id = aap.application_id
                                      and tmd.page_id = aap.page_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: Pages should limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20. : Try to limit the number of Dynamic Actions per page to 10. Never more than 20.
test.fix: Cut down on the number of Dynamic Actions

test.test_name: Pages should not have local CSS
test.query_clob:
select case when aap.inline_css is null
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id, 
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Page %0 (Application %1) has page-level inline CSS^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format(
        p_message => q'^Remove page-level inline CSS (Page %0 /Application %1) ^',
        p0 => aap.page_id,
        p1 => aap.application_id) issue_title,
			 aap.build_option,
       abo.build_option_status,
       abo.status_on_export,
			 aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
			 aap.workspace
from apex_application_pages aap
inner join v_apex_applications aa on aap.application_id = aa.application_id
                                  and aa.availability_status != 'Unavailable'
left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on abo.application_id = aap.application_id 
                                                   and abo.build_option_name = aap.build_option
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
test.explanation: All CSS should be centralized and kept out of local pages. Applications should consolidate CSS and not have CSS locally
